languages.text: Заряд щита не восстанавливается в течение боя, но он полностью восстанавливается между боями и его можно перезаряжать способностью корабля Перезагрузка щитов. Щиты не всегда поглощают весь получаемый урон. В зависимости от их оставшегося заряда, щит может поглотить как весь урон, так и его половину, или не поглотить ничего вообще. Чем больше остаток заряда — тем больше шансов на поглощение. При полностью заряженном щите гарантированно поглощается весь урон. При заряде больше половины поглощается либо весь, либо половина урона. При заряде щита меньше 50% поглощается либо половина урона, либо ничего.

The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.
languages.original_text: Заряд щита не восстанавливается в течение боя, но он полностью восстанавливается между боями и его можно перезаряжать способностью корабля Перезагрузка щитов. Чем больше остаток заряда — тем больше шансов на поглощение. При полностью заряженном щите гарантированно поглощается весь урон. При заряде больше половины поглощается либо весь, либо половина урона. При заряде щита меньше 50% поглощается либо половина урона, либо ничего.

traits.locale_text: The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the Restart Shields ability. Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all of the damage or half of it. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half of the damage or no damage.

languages.text:
Die Schildladung erholt sich nicht automatisch während des Kampfes, wird aber zwischen Gefechten komplett aufgefüllt und kann durch Nutzen der Fähigkeit {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Schilde wieder hochfahren{/g} neu geladen werden.
Schilde absorbieren nicht immer den gesamten Schaden, der dem Schiff zugefügt wird. Abhängig von der Menge der Ladung eines Schildsektors kann er allen Schaden, die Hälfte oder auch gar keinen absorbieren. Je mehr Ladung ein Schildsektor hat, desto höher ist die Chance, dass Schaden absorbiert wird. Ein komplett geladener Schild absorbiert garantiert allen möglichen Schaden. Liegt die Ladung bei 50 % oder höher, absorbiert der Schild entweder den gesamten oder halben Schaden. Liegt die Ladung bei 50 % oder niedriger, absorbiert der Schild entweder den halben oder gar keinen Schaden.
languages.original_text:
The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.

traits.locale_text: Die Schildladung erholt sich nicht automatisch während des Kampfes, wird aber zwischen Gefechten komplett aufgefüllt und kann durch Nutzen der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit {/g} Schilde wieder hochfahren neu geladen werden. Schilde absorbieren nicht immer den gesamten Schaden, der dem Schiff zugefügt wird. Abhängig von der Menge der Ladung eines {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}Schildsektors{/g} kann er allen Schaden, die Hälfte oder auch gar keinen absorbieren. Je mehr Ladung ein Schildsektor hat, desto höher ist die Chance, dass Schaden absorbiert wird. Ein komplett geladener Schild absorbiert garantiert allen möglichen Schaden. Liegt die Ladung bei 50 % oder höher, absorbiert der Schild entweder den gesamten oder halben Schaden. Liegt die Ladung bei 50 % oder niedriger, absorbiert der Schild entweder den halben oder gar keinen Schaden.

languages.text:
La charge des boucliers ne se rétablit pas automatiquement à mi-combat, mais elle est entièrement reconstituée entre les affrontements et peut être rechargée à l'aide de la capacité {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Redémarrer les boucliers{/g}.
Les boucliers n'absorbent pas systématiquement la totalité des dégâts infligés au vaisseau. Selon le niveau de charge d'un secteur des boucliers, celui-ci peut absorber l'intégralité des dégâts, la moitié, voire aucun. Plus un secteur des boucliers est chargé, plus il a de chances d'absorber des dégâts. Un bouclier entièrement chargé peut absorber tous les dégâts. Lorsque la charge est supérieure ou égale à 50 %, le bouclier absorbe la totalité ou la moitié des dégâts. Lorsque la charge est inférieure ou égale à 50 %, le bouclier absorbe la moitié des dégâts, voire aucun.
languages.original_text:
The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.

traits.locale_text: La charge des boucliers ne se rétablit pas automatiquement à mi-combat, mais elle est entièrement reconstituée entre les combats et peut être rechargée à l'aide de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Redémarrer les boucliers. Les boucliers n'absorbent pas systématiquement la totalité des dégâts infligés au vaisseau. Selon le niveau de charge d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}secteur des boucliers{/g}, celui-ci peut absorber l'intégralité des dégâts, la moitié, voire aucun. Plus un secteur des boucliers est chargé, plus il a de chances d'absorber des dégâts. Un bouclier entièrement chargé peut absorber tous les dégâts. Lorsque la charge est supérieure ou égale à 50 %, le bouclier absorbe la totalité ou la moitié des dégâts. Lorsque la charge est inférieure ou égale à 50 %, le bouclier absorbe la moitié des dégâts, voire aucun.

languages.text:
旗舰的护盾不会再战斗中自动恢复，但战斗结束后会自动恢复。此外，您还可以使用{g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}重启护盾{/g}能力对混沌进行充能。
护盾并非总能吸收所有来袭的伤害。护盾区域可能会吸收全部伤害、一半伤害，或完全不吸收任何伤害，取决护盾当前的能量等级。护盾区域的能量越足，吸收伤害的几率就越高。当护盾完全充能时，必定会吸收承受的所有伤害。当护盾充能等级在50%以上时，护盾会吸收全部伤害或一半伤害。当护盾充能等级在50%以下时，护盾会只吸收一半伤害，或完全不吸收伤害。
languages.original_text:
The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.

traits.locale_text: 旗舰的护盾不会再战斗中自动恢复，但战斗结束后会自动恢复。此外，您还可以使用重启护盾{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}对混沌进行充能。 护盾并非总能吸收所有来袭的伤害。{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}护盾区域{/g}可能会吸收全部伤害、一半伤害，或完全不吸收任何伤害，取决护盾当前的能量等级。护盾区域的能量越足，吸收伤害的几率就越高。当护盾完全充能时，必定会吸收承受的所有伤害。当护盾充能等级在50%以上时，护盾会吸收全部伤害或一半伤害。当护盾充能等级在50%以下时，护盾会只吸收一半伤害，或完全不吸收伤害。

languages.text:
La carga del escudo no se recupera automáticamente en la batalla, sino que se rellena por completo entre combate y combate o mediante la capacidad {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Reiniciar escudos{/g}.
Los escudos no absorben siempre todo el daño que recibe la nave. En función de la carga que tenga el sector de escudo, cabe la posibilidad de que absorba el daño en su totalidad, la mitad o nada en absoluto. Cuanta más carga tenga un sector de escudo, mayores serán las probabilidades de que absorba daño. Si el escudo está cargado por completo, absorberá todo el daño que reciba. Cuando la carga sea del 50 % o más, el escudo absorbe todo o la mitad del daño. En caso de que sea del 50 % o menos, el escudo absorbe la mitad o ningún daño.
languages.original_text:
The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.

traits.locale_text: La carga del escudo no se recupera automáticamente en la batalla, sino que se rellena por completo entre combate y combate o mediante la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Reiniciar escudos. Los escudos no absorben siempre todo el daño que recibe la nave. En función de la carga que tenga el {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}sector de escudo{/g}, cabe la posibilidad de que absorba el daño en su totalidad, la mitad o nada en absoluto. Cuanta más carga tenga un sector de escudo, mayores serán las probabilidades de que absorba daño. Si el escudo está cargado por completo, absorberá todo el daño que reciba. Cuando la carga sea del 50 % o más, el escudo absorbe todo o la mitad del daño. En caso de que sea del 50 % o menos, el escudo absorbe la mitad o ningún daño.

languages.original_text: The shield charge does not regenerate during a battle, but it is fully restored between battles and can be recharged with the ship's Shield Reload ability. Shields do not always absorb all the damage they take. Depending on their remaining charge, a shield may absorb half or all of the damage, or none at all. The greater the remaining charge, the greater the chance of absorption. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all damage. If the shield is more than half charged, either all or half of the damage is absorbed. If the shield is less than 50% charged, either half or none of the damage is absorbed.

languages.text: シールドのチャージは戦闘中には自動的に回復しないが、戦闘と戦闘の間に最大まで補充され、シールド再起動アビリティを使用すると再度チャージが可能。 シールドが必ずしも船が受けたダメージ全てを吸収するわけではない。シールドセクターのチャージ量によっては、ダメージの全てまたは半分を吸収、あるいは全く吸収しない可能性もある。シールドセクターのチャージが多いほど、ダメージ吸収の確率が高くなる。完全にチャージされた状態のシールドは、そのシールドが許容できる限りの全てのダメージを吸収する。チャージが50％以上の場合、シールドはダメージの全量または半量を吸収する。チャージが50％以下の場合、シールドはダメージの半量を吸収するか、あるいは全く吸収しない。
languages.original_text: The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the Restart Shields ability. Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.

traits.locale_text: シールドのチャージは戦闘中には自動的に回復しないが、戦闘と戦闘の間に最大まで補充され、シールド再起動{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると再度チャージが可能。 シールドが必ずしも船が受けたダメージ全てを吸収するわけではない。{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}シールドセクター{/g}のチャージ量によっては、ダメージの全てまたは半分を吸収、あるいは全く吸収しない可能性もある。シールドセクターのチャージが多いほど、ダメージ吸収の確率が高くなる。チャージが満タン状態のシールドは、そのシールドが許容できる限りの全てのダメージを吸収できる。チャージが50％以上の場合、シールドはダメージの全量または半量を吸収できる。チャージが50％以下の場合、シールドはダメージの半量を吸収するか、あるいは全く吸収しなくなる。

languages.text:
Kalkan şarjı, çatışmanın ortasında kendiliğinden tazelenmez ancak çatışmalar arasında veya {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Kalkanları Tekrar Başlat{/g} kabiliyeti kullanılarak yenilenebilir.
Kalkanlar, gemiye verilen hasarın tamamını her zaman ememeyebilirler. Bir kalkan sektörü, ne kadar gücü olduğuna bağlı olarak hasarın tümünü veya yarısını emebileceği gibi hasarı hiç de emmeyebilir. Kalkan sektörü, ne kadar güce sahipse hasar emme olasılığı da o kadar yüksek olur. Gücü tam bir kalkanın gelen hasarın tamamını emme ihtimali %100'dür. Güç, %50 veya daha yüksek olduğunda kalkan hasarın tamamını veya yarısını emer. Güç, %50 veya daha düşük olduğunda ise kalkan hasarın yarısını emer veya hasarı hiç emmez.

The shield charge does not recover automatically mid-combat, but it is fully replenished between battles and can be recharged using the {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} ability.
Shields do not always absorb the entirety of the damage dealt to the ship. Depending on how much charge a shield sector has, it might absorb all of the damage, half of it, or none at all. The more charge a shield sector has, the higher the chance of it absorbing damage. A fully charged shield is guaranteed to absorb all the damage it can. When the charge is at 50% or higher, the shield absorbs either all or half of the damage. When the charge is at 50% or lower, the shield absorbs either half or no damage.
